snippet: The Board of Health, an obscure city board that will rule on a proposed ban on large sugary drinks, has had a major influence on the health habits of New Yorkers.
abstract: The Board of Health, an obscure city board that will rule on a proposed ban on large sugary drinks, has had a major influence on the health habits of New Yorkers.

headline.main: With Rulings on Rubbish and Tattoos, Safeguarding the City for Centuries
headline.print_headline: City’s Health Boards Have Ruled on Livestock and Tattoos. Up Next: Soda.
